Module com.example.batallanaval
Package com.example.batallanaval.model

Class BN

java.lang.Object
com.example.batallanaval.model.BN
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBN
public class BN extends Object implements IBN
Represents the game model for the Naval Battle game. This class implements the IBN interface and provides methods to create game elements (shapes) and display alerts for various scenarios.
